cyclone.name: MARCO
cyclone.current_location: about 240 miles SSE of the Mouth of the Mississippi River
cyclone.trajectory: moving north-northwest, forecast to turn northwest then west-northwest and skirt the Louisiana coast before weakening inland

weather_observation.watch_coast: Storm Surge Watch is in effect from Sabine Pass, TX eastward to Morgan City, LA
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning from Morgan City, LA to the Mouth of the Pearl River; Tropical-Storm Warning from Cameron, LA to west of Morgan City, LA
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Central and north-central Gulf Coast from eastern Texas through Louisiana, Mississippi and Alabama
weather_observation.wind: Tropical-storm-force gusts possible Tuesday with peak probability only 12%
weather_observation.storm_surge: 1–3 ft inundation possible at Sabine Pass and upper Texas coast, including Beaumont waterways
weather_observation.rainfall: 1–3 inches of rain possible, locally higher in bands
weather_observation.other_hazards: Dangerous rip currents along upper Texas coast
